dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1234 IS: FIX Credit Reporting Errors Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Klobuchar (for herself and Mr. Daines) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To enhance consumer rights relating to consumer report disputes by requiring provision of documentation provided by consumers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the FIX Credit Reporting Errors Act or the FIX Act.

section.header: Provision of documentation provided by consumers
section.text: Section 611 of the Fair Credit Reporting Act (15 U.S.C. 1681i) is amended—

clause.text: in subparagraph (A), by inserting , including documentation provided by the consumer, after relevant information; and
in subparagraph (B), by inserting , including documentation provided by the consumer, after relevant information; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (4), by inserting , including documentation, after relevant information; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (f)(2)(B)(ii), by inserting , including documentation, after relevant information.
